metadata.synopsis: SoB member one-liner: Doctor Moorcombe, an expert on myconids who is suffering withdrawal from the fungal spores.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - CTY_Main_A- Use debug book to reach the Lodge

1.speaker: Doctor Moorcombe
1.text: Well met! I'm the Society's leading expert on myconid spore telepathy, but I've had to delay my experiments - run out of spores, you see.

0.speaker: Doctor Moorcombe
0.text: I miss them, those myconid spores. Don't feel quite right without them. Probably shouldn't have inhaled them all so quickly. Eh?

2.speaker: Doctor Moorcombe
2.text: I miss my spores. Tried eating some toadstools I got from Bonecloak's, but no good - just made me constipated.
